text: László Szalay (13 December 1914 – 15 April 2008) was a Hungarian alpine skier who competed in the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Hungarian male alpine skiers Category:Hungarian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Hungary Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Hungary Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics
title: László Szalay (skier)
